title: Draft preview, Mariota landing spots
itunes:title: Draft preview, Mariota landing spots
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling, Gregg Rosenthal and Marc Sessler – previews the 2015 NFL Draft, breaking down the biggest storylines and juiciest rumors ahead of the offseason’s showpiece event in the Windy City. Don’t miss out as the gang discusses Oregon quarterback Marcus Mariota’s possible landing spots, what trades they’d love to see and where Adrian Peterson and Philip Rivers will be playing come next week.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
